name: Cloudlust
description:
A short flying game where you dropped your balloons on your way to grandmother for her birthday party. Collect them all and hurry there.

Controls: 

Gamepad left thumbstick: Roll/Yaw

Gamepad left/right bumpers: Turn

Gamepad Triggers: Increase/Decrease throttle

Gamepad right thumbstick: rotate camera

Xbox B Button: Realign camera

Xbox Y button: Look at

Mouse: Roll/Yaw

Q/E : Turn

Left Shift/Ctrl : Increase/Decrease throttle

WASD: / Roll/Yaw/Turn
